sense.gloss: deviation value (usu. scaled to mean of 50, standard deviation of 10, and often used for academic grades), deviation, T-score, standard score

sdata.j: たまには↑偏差↑↓|へんさ↓↑値↑↓ち|↓の↑高↑↓たか↓い↑人↑↓ひと↓とレベルの↑高↑↓たか↓い↑会話↑↓かいわ↓してみたい。
sdata.e: I like to have a deep conversation with a more academic person from time to time.
